front.title: Home Agent assisted Route Optimization between Mobile IPv4 Networks

abstract.t: This document describes a Home Agent assisted Route Optimizationfunctionality to IPv4 Network Mobility Protocol. The function isdesigned to facilitate optimal routing in cases where all nodes areconnected to a single Home Agent, thus the use case is RouteOptimization within single organization or similar entity. Thefunctionality adds possibility to discover eligible peer nodes basedon information received from Home Agent, Network Prefixes theyrepresent, and how to establish direct tunnel between such nodes.
